Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
03.10.2014 GB SCR19194 Extended selection and record description
11.06.2014 GB SCR18921 Done conversion via GB023 before writing content of file to BLOB-field
29.05.2014 GB SCR18844 Added Store FFIS
10.02.2014 GB SCR18696 Changed range of DEBH selection
04.02.2014 GB SCR18697 Extended range of DEBC selection
28.08.2013 GB SCR18353 Added the test that V.SUM = sum(abs DEBB_ACTINVAH), added Clientnoâ€™s and Balance
16.04.2013 GB SCR17993 Added/removed some fields to/from the report
07.03.2013 SH SCR18004 Changed partial filename for CSV from "Graydon" to GSBU_TEXT(2057)
28.02.2013 GB SCR17993 Changed type of file from ASCII to CSV
26.10.2012 SH SCR17619 Skip second GB723 argument
12.07.2011 JH SCR16605 Removed test on DHIC_INFS_CODE in
sql selection of DEBH
12.01.2010 GB SCR15245 Removed the part2 (now there is as BDH403)
10.12.2009 GB SCR14216 extended select condition for part1
11.09.2008 GB SCR13946 changed condition for call part2
28.07.2008 GB SCR13806 changed condition for selction part 1 and part 2
16.01.2007 AK SCR12219 add a note to the journal when ascii file is empty
02.05.2006 AK SCR11102 added condition - A.DEBH_FREECODE is null
19.04.2006 AK SCR10975 added part 2 SCRL file for france debtors
-- Global variables
-- Variables for ASCII file have to defined with a fixed lenght
-- Prepare CSV file folder and name
-- CSV file created with contents
... convert UNIX based text-files to Windows format,only if BPH403
runs nativ on AS400
-- Create a new row in FILES_FROM_INFORMATION_SUPPLIER (FFIS)
... emty CSV file was created, delete file

STP.TXT: E M P T Y C S V F I L E ( N L ) H A S B E E N C R E A T E D :
F I L E I S B E I N G D E L E T E D .

SQL_STMT_U.val: select A.DEBH_NO, A.DEBH_HADR_NAME1, A.DEBH_HADR_ADDRESS, A.DEBH_HADR_CITY, A.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY, A.DEBH_TEL, A.DEBH_PADR_ADDRESS, A.DEBH_PADR_CITY, A.DEBH_PADR_ZIP, A.DEBH_FAX from :1/debh A where A.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY = 'NL' and A.DEBH_DATDELETED is null and A.DEBH_ENRICHED = 'N' and A.DEBH_CARRIERDOCTRANS = 'N' and not(exists ( select * from :1/DHRW C where C.DHRW_FIELDTYPE = 12 and upper(trim(A.DEBH_HADR_NAME1)) like upper(trim(C.DHRW_RESERVEDWORD))||' %' ) ) and exists(select * from :1/debc, :1/admn where debc_debh = A.DEBH_NO and debc_datdeleted is null and admn_no = debc_admno and admn_testclients = 'N') order by A.DEBH_NO for fetch only optimize for 100 row

Text.val: -- Reset variables
-- If V.SUM < GSBU_AMOUNT then skip the DEBTOR_HELLER row
-- Extract zip code and city
-- Prepare variables for CSV file
-- Finally update current DEBH row

ExpSyntax.val: 'Heller debtornr'&';'&'Company name'&';'&'Street'&';'&'Postal code'&';'&'City'&';'&'Phone'&';'&'Postal Street'&';'&'Postal City'&';'&'Postal ZIP'&';'&'FAX'&';'&'Clientno'&ASCIIChr(39)&'s'&';'&'Balance'&';'&'Official registration nr'&';'&'KVK of client'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (abs(DEBB_ACTINVAH)) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DEBC, :1/DEBB, :1/ADMN where DEBC_DEBH = :2 and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and ADMN_NO = DEBC_ADMNO and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N'
